title: Post Game Lobby: Toxic player haven?
body:
im finding people talking way more trash at the post game lobby. 

"you suck kill yourself %%%%%%"

etc.

But will they get banned ?

As far as I know they can talk as much shit as they want post game.

replies.body:
Ahhhh yes, the sweet sweet blind spot! 

Someone write a song about talking crap to people in post game and do it the tune of that willy wonka song when he let's the kids loose in the candy garden area.
It has been five seasons ans riot has never stated anything on that issue. Not really sure if it will get any better any time soon, So don't get your hopes up.
